_source.short_desc: GoodSync for Business provides complete enterprise data backup and synchronization solutions for any data source,
_source.long_desc: GoodSync for Business provides complete enterprise data backup and synchronization solutions for any data source, destination, or system. In addition, the GoodSync Control Center provides centralized management and reporting of file synchronization, backup, and publishing activities of GoodSync workstations and servers.
_source.target_audience: Businesses and organizations of any size.

category_features.name: Audit Trail
category_features.definition: Track changes and view date/time records

category_features.name: Backup and Recovery
category_features.definition: Create backups and provide methods to recover deleted/lost data

category_features.name: Conflict Tracking
category_features.definition: Detects conflicts in the latest version when multiple users are editing a file at the same time

category_features.name: Real Time Synchronization
category_features.definition: Files and folders are updated in real-time when changes/edits are made

category_features.name: Remote Synchronization
category_features.definition: Helps in synchronizing files and folders from remote servers or computers

category_features.name: Synchronization Scheduling
category_features.definition: Create a schedule when files and folders are synchronized

category_features.name: Two-Way Synchronization
category_features.definition: Synchronization process that copies files in both directions to reconcile changes as needed

category_features.name: Backup Log
category_features.definition: Records the events that occur during a backup process

category_features.name: Backup Scheduling
category_features.definition: Allows automatic backups (with all filtering, compressing, transferring to the storage, and other)

category_features.name: Cloud Backup
category_features.definition: Allows back up of files to cloud storage like Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox

category_features.name: Compression
category_features.definition: Reduction in the number of bits needed to represent data

category_features.name: Encryption
category_features.definition: Convert data into a code for security

category_features.name: Incremental Backup
category_features.definition: Copy only the new data that has been changed or created since the previous backup

category_features.name: Backup Scheduling
category_features.definition: Allows automatic backups (with all filtering, compressing, transferring to the storage, and other)

category_features.name: Bare-Metal Restore
category_features.definition: Restore the physical Window Servers, Desktops and Laptops from the scratch

category_features.name: Compression
category_features.definition: Reduction in the number of bits needed to represent data

category_features.name: Continuous Backup
category_features.definition: Backup of computer data  automatically saving a copy of every change made to that data

category_features.name: Differential Backup
category_features.definition: Cumulative backup of all changes made since the last full backup

category_features.name: Disaster Recovery
category_features.definition: Plan and implement business continuity measures in case of unforeseen events

category_features.name: Encryption
category_features.definition: Convert data into a code for security

category_features.name: Incremental Backup
category_features.definition: A type of backup that only copies files that have changed since the previous backup

category_features.name: VM Backup
category_features.definition: Copying of data on a virtual machine (VM) in a VMware environment to prevent data loss

related_products.short_desc: Save a file to the Dropbox folder on your computer, and it will synchronize automatically to your mobile device. Try it for free today!
related_products.features: Save a file to the Dropbox folder on your computer, and it will synchronize automatically to your mobile device?making it easy to work from anywhere. Dropbox Business is a digital workplace trusted by over 300,000 business teams worldwide and over 50% of the Fortune 500 for its industry leading file sync, collaboration, and extensive administration and security features that scale as teams grow.

related_products.short_desc: The secure file sharing and storage solution built for business. Featuring state-of-the-art, compliance-supporting security.
related_products.features: Take productivity to the next level with ShareFile. Securely send, share, get feedback, approvals and even e-signatures on any file, fast. Business-class file sharing meets real-time collaboration to accelerate productivity with automated workflows you customize and control.  Give real-time feedback, request approvals, co-edit-even get legally binding e-signatures seamlessly-on any device. Plus, with real-time tracking, you always know exactly where things stand.  Using SSAE 16 Type II certified

related_products.short_desc: Web-based storage solution with secure data transfer and iron-clad encryption that keeps your documents safe.
related_products.features:
pCloud Business - Secure Cloud Storage Solution for Small and Medium Companies

- One place to store, sync and collaborate on your business files with your colleagues 
- 1 TB storage and pCloud Encryption now included for each user in the Business Account
- Share your business documents securely with colleagues, partners and clients
- Easy to use tools designed to help you control and optimize your workflow

You can try pCloud Business - Free for 30 days

related_products.short_desc: Tresorit is the end-to-end encrypted file sync and sharing solution which safeguards confidential information by design.
related_products.features:
Tresorit is an end-to-end encrypted file sync and sharing solution designed to safeguard sensitive content. Unlike other public cloud vendors, Tresorit has no access to user files, which ensures maximum confidentiality.
- Files are protected from the moment you upload them to the cloud, until they reach the intended recipient.
- Tresorit provides a digital workspace where your highly sensitive documents remain safe.
- Manage and oversee all users and their data with powerful control options.

related_products.short_desc: An on-premise solution that provides a secure and reliable file transfer solution for the demanding IT professional.
related_products.features: Cerberus FTP Server provides a secure and reliable file transfer solution for the demanding IT professional. Supporting SFTP, FTP/S, and HTTP/S, Cerberus is able to authenticate against Active Directory and LDAP, run as a Windows service, has native x64 support, includes a robust set of integrity and security features and offers an easy-to-use manager for controlling user access to files and file operations.

related_products.short_desc: Eliminate the monotony of back-and-forth emails. Gather all the documents, signatures, and data you require up to 80% faster.
related_products.features:
Eliminate the monotony of back-and-forth emails and inefficient systems when gathering client information. Get hours back each week as FIleInvite handles the most time-consuming work for you.

Gather all the documents, signatures, and data you require up to 80% faster. Set a due date and send an Invite. Your clients receive an email with a link to their own secure client portal, they're then guided through an intuitive portal experience where they can action your requests.

related_products.short_desc: Effectively secures, automates, manages, and protects critical data as well as processes and workflows.
related_products.features: Effectively secure, automate, manage, and protect your most critical data as well as the resulting processes and workflows. Progress MOVEit solutions allow you to manage, provision, and automate all internal and external file and data interactions, create and enforce security policies and file-expiration rules, ensure privacy and confidentiality, schedule workflows and processes and more--all without any manual scripting. Request a Trial Today!

related_products.short_desc: Egnyte understands how content is created & consumed and this can be leveraged to better orchestrate workflow
related_products.features: Egnyte understands how content is created & consumed and this can be leveraged to better orchestrate workflow

related_products.short_desc: Secure Cloud FTP platform trusted by companies from Adobe to Zillow. Instant setup for manual and automated transfers.
related_products.features:
Empower your business operations with the instant-setup Cloud FTP platform that helps over 5000 companies in 101 countries perform manual and automated file transfers. We're evolving FTP - supporting open standards, but adding easy web management running on enterprise-grade infrastructure.

Our platform provides tons of capabilities including:
Full FTP, FTPS and SFTP support.
Detailed logs & granular user permissions.
Robust developer API.
Event-driven webhooks.
SSH key management.

related_products.short_desc: Fast and secure file sync solution that provides UNLIMITED storage and file sizes. Uses p2p tech to improve speed by 2-10x.
related_products.features: Resilio Sync is a fast, easy and secure file sync and sharing solution that provides UNLIMITED storage and file sizes, starting at $30/month for 5 users. Resilio is used by thousands of small and large companies. Resilio Sync uses peer-to-peer technology that typically improves file transfer speeds by 2-10x. Try Resilio Sync FREE today (no credit card required).

related_products.short_desc: Give your desktop the cloud advantage with Zoho WorkDrive. Sync to the cloud from your Windows, Mac, or Linux desktop and vice versa.
related_products.features: Easily transfer files between your desktop and the cloud with Zoho WorkDrive Sync for Desktop! Just drag and drop files from your desktop to the app and they'll sync to the cloud when you connect to the internet. WorkDrive's modern interface offers secure Team Folders, granular access controls, a built-in office suite, and advanced data management capabilities.

similar_products.short_desc: An on-premise solution that provides a secure and reliable file transfer solution for the demanding IT professional.
similar_products.features: Cerberus FTP Server provides a secure and reliable file transfer solution for the demanding IT professional. Supporting SFTP, FTP/S, and HTTP/S, Cerberus is able to authenticate against Active Directory and LDAP, run as a Windows service, has native x64 support, includes a robust set of integrity and security features and offers an easy-to-use manager for controlling user access to files and file operations.

similar_products.short_desc: Offers cloud-first global filesystem for cross-site file sync & lock, consolidated cloud NAS file storage, simple backup & recovery.
similar_products.features:
Morro Data CloudNAS file sync and lock enables companies with two or more offices to share their files in real-time and no VPN or sync software required. The solution allows businesses to quickly and efficiently have unlimited file storage, collaborate with multiple office file sync & lock, and get instant disaster recovery. 
Cloud NAS combines the local network performance of a NAS with the reliability, scalability, and accessibility of the cloud for a cloud-first solution.

similar_products.short_desc: Files.com is a SaaS file transfer platform that enables organizations to securely store, transfer, and share business-critical files.
similar_products.features:
Files.com is a SaaS file transfer platform that enables organizations to securely transfer or share files between users, teams, organizations (B2B), and customers (B2C). 

Files.com has been providing businesses with secure, cloud native file transfers for 10+ years, servicing over 6000+ customers across key industries like healthcare, finance, media, technology, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: FIle sync and data backup system for individuals and small businesses excelling in both simplicity of interface and degree of control.
similar_products.features: Buddha Backup doubles as both a simple data backup system and a powerful file sync program to serve both the most technophobic and tech savvy among us as well as small businesses. On top of that it is affordable at only $10 for a lifetime license. Compare that to at least $30 for the competition! Don't be mistaken; Buddha Backup is as powerful as the best and most popular file sync/backup software out there.

similar_products.short_desc: Eliminate the monotony of back-and-forth emails. Gather all the documents, signatures, and data you require up to 80% faster.
similar_products.features:
Eliminate the monotony of back-and-forth emails and inefficient systems when gathering client information. Get hours back each week as FIleInvite handles the most time-consuming work for you.

Gather all the documents, signatures, and data you require up to 80% faster. Set a due date and send an Invite. Your clients receive an email with a link to their own secure client portal, they're then guided through an intuitive portal experience where they can action your requests.

Just drag and drop files from your desktop to the app and they'll sync to the cloud when you connect to the internet. WorkDrive's modern interface offers secure Team Folders, granular access controls, a built-in office suite, and advanced data management capabilities.

similar_products.short_desc: FileFlex Enterprise is a zero trust overlay service that governs, restricts and manages remote access and sharing of unstructured data
similar_products.features: FileFlex Enterprise is a zero trust overlay service that governs, restricts and manages remote access and sharing of unstructured data to help protect high-value targets through role-based access according to least privilege reducing data exposure and likelihood of ransomware.

similar_products.short_desc: Egnyte understands how content is created & consumed and this can be leveraged to better orchestrate workflow
similar_products.features: Egnyte understands how content is created & consumed and this can be leveraged to better orchestrate workflow

similar_products.short_desc: Switch on file sync for legal professionals with Thomson Reuters? HighQ.
similar_products.features: HighQ's modern, adaptable, and continuously-learning legal workflow platform delivers an open and scalable foundation, embedded machine intelligence and analytics, and smart integration points with firm-critical applications. Dramatically improve how you plan, organize, track, and complete work more efficiently with personalized client portals and real-time access and insights on legal project work, ready-to-use task lists and templates, and automated workflow-enabled legal process maps.

similar_products.short_desc: Altova DiffDog is a powerful tool for comparing files, directories, and databases.
similar_products.features: Altova DiffDog is a powerful tool for comparing files, directories, and databases. Compare 2 and 3 documents of text, source code, XML, JSON, and more. DiffDog can even compare Word docs and relational databases. With a straightforward and consistent user interface, DiffDog is a powerful diff/merge tool for all common comparison tasks.

similar_products.short_desc: Google Workspace is how teams of all sizes connect, create, and collaborate - to drive innovation from any device, and any location.
similar_products.features: Google Workspace provides flexible storage options so you will always have enough space for your files. Store any and every file. Access files any time, anywhere from your desktop and mobile devices. Use shared drives to store your team's work in secure, easy-to-manage shared spaces. Any files added to shared drives are owned collectively by the team, so everyone stays up to date.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Backup software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Backup tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Backup software ensures security of critical data by creating redundant copies that can be restored to replace corrupted or lost data.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Continuity software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Continuity tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Continuity software helps organizations to identify threats and plan for the prevention and recovery of information assets. These applications protect key organizational data in the event of a failure and in the wake of trouble, aid the rapid restoration of system function and data access. Typically Business Continuity solutions offer options for continuous or scheduled monitoring along with a variety of real-time data recovery tools. Backup storage can be maintained locally or routed to a remote server. Business Continuity software is related to Database Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Collaboration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Collaboration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Collaboration software enables the sharing of information by providing an online or intranet-based environment for virtual teamwork. These applications allow for greater efficiency in managing document libraries and versions, projects in progress, report editing, threaded discussions, calendar sharing, knowledge base search, workflow and task management. Collaboration solutions often feature integration for a variety of real-time communications tools including: video or voice conferencing, email and instant messaging. Collaboration software is related to Project Management software and Web Conferencing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Disk Imaging software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Disk Imaging tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Disk Imaging software assists organizations with creating copies, known as images, of data storage devices, such as optical disks, flash drives, SSDs, and hard drives to backup and restore disk data in cases of system failure, disk decommissioning, or forensic analysis.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top File Sharing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of File Sharing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: File Sharing software gives you the ability to quickly and securely share data across your company and with external partners. Sync your data across all your devices, access files and information from anywhere, and solve your data storage problems with file sharing software. Need more help? Visit the Collaboration software, Document Management software, Content Management software, and Portal software categories.
